page.title: 03Outdoor Pursuits,Llandogo.2.
page.content: Approximately 1,500 people visit the Priory each year on a weekly basis.In the evenings they play football,go out for walks,hold discos, sometimes they have school lessons, and they play badminton and table tennis. The proprietress has lots of hobbies she makes baskets and patchwork.She does a lot of gardening and she makes wine.Also the proprietress is the W.I. president of Llandogo and a member of the Llandogo village hall committee.In the proprietress' spare time she goes to Pen-y-van village,which is near Trellech,to the Beacon Riding Stables to help supervise rides and clean the stables.She enjoys her work at the Priory very much.
